episodes.title: 10-21-20 - Hour 3 - Where does Zack Wilson fit in the national QB conversation?
episodes.description: On the third hour of the show, Ben catches up with former Cougar Alex Karesa. Ben talks to alex aout how the team has been playing and they also talk Zack Wilson and his potential draft stock. Darell Dixon also joins the program to talk BYUs schedule and a possible NY6 bowl.

episodes.title: 10-21-20 - Darnell Dickson talks BYU football, positions groups, and schedule
episodes.description: Darnell Dickson, from the Daily Herald, joins the show. Darnell talks with Ben about how the team has been playing, and about specific players and positions groups. Darnell and Ben also talk about the schedule and how it could effect a possible NY6 bowl game.

episodes.title: 10-21-20 - Alex Kuresa talks BYU football and where he thinks Zack Wilson could go in the NFL draft
episodes.description: Former Cougar, Alex Kuresa, joins the show. Alex joins Ben to talk about what he has seen so far this season out of BYU. Alex and Ben also talk Zack Wilson and Alex offers some thoughts on how he matches up with other QBs like Jordan Love and where he could go in the draft.

episodes.title: 10-21-20 - Hour 2 - How is the team feeling after the Houston win
episodes.description: Ben listens to some sounds bites from different personal on the team talking about their recent play as well as upcoming schedule. Ben also catches up with Moose Bingham to talk recruiting and some of the states top talent.

episodes.title: 10-21-20 - Moose Bingham on where BYU stand with some of the states top prospects
episodes.description: Moose Bingham, VP of Sales for Prep War Room, joins the show. Moose joins Ben to talk about some of the top recruits from the state of Utah. Moose talks about where BYU stands in possibly landing some young talent.

episodes.title: 10-21-20 - Hour 1 - What does Texas State think of BYU?
episodes.description: On the first hour of the show, Ben listens to sound from Texas State Head Coach Jake Spavital. Ben also catches up with Pastor and former Cougar Derwin Gray to talk about how to stay focused through crazy times.

episodes.title: 10-21-20 - Derwin Gray on how to block out the noise and stay focused on football
episodes.description: Pastor and former Cougar, Derwin Gray, joins the show. Derwin joins Ben to talk about how to block out the noise, remain focused and excell at the task at hand.

episodes.title: Jeff Monken - Army HC - 8-17-20
episodes.description: Army Head Coach, Jeff Monken, was on the Dan Patrick show and he answered some questions regarding scheduling

episodes.title: Eric Mateos - BYU OL Coach - 8-17-20
episodes.description: Eric Meteos, BYUs OL Coach answered some questions about how the OL has been preparing and if they would be ready for a season if it started tomorrow

episodes.title: Gunner Romney - BYU WR - 8-17-20
episodes.description: BYU WR Gunner Romney answered some questions at media availability regarding his health and the play of the WR group ahead of this season

episodes.title: Tyler Allgier - BYU RB - 8-17-20
episodes.description: BYU RB, Tyler Allgeir, answered some questions regarding depth, conditioning and how has in preparing for this upcoming season

episodes.title: 8-17-20 - Dusty Litster - Deseret New Rewind - How would you rank the 3 Military schools?
episodes.description: Dusty Litster, of Deseret News Rewind, joins the show to talk about a possible Army game. Dusty also weighs in on how he would rank the three military academies.

episodes.title: 8-17-20 - Jarom Jordan - BYU SportsNation - What will BYUs schedule look like?
episodes.description: Jarom Jordan, of BYU SportsNation, joins the show to talk BYU schedule. Jarom talks about what the schedule may look like and who may be willing to play the Cougars

episodes.title: 8-17-20 - Hour 3 - Who is BYUs RB1?
episodes.description: On the third hour of the show, Ben and Moose hear some sound bites from the team as well as discuss the depth chart specifically at RB

episodes.title: 8-17-20 - Hour 2 - Is Army scared to play BYU?
episodes.description: On the second hour of the show, Ben and Moose talk about the potential Army vs. BYU game. Jarom Jordan also joins the show to talk scheduling as well as Dusty Litster from the Deseret News Rewind

episodes.title: 8-17-20 - Hour 1 - Who are BYUs most exciting recruits?
episodes.description: On the first hour of the show, Ben is joined by Moose Bingham to talk high school football and talk about who are some of BYUs most promising recruits. They also talk about what the schedule could look like for this season.

episodes.title: Trajan Pili - 8-12-20 - Who has the most talent on the BYU defense
episodes.description: Former BYU DL, Trajan Pili, joins the show. Trajan joins Ben to talk about the BYU defense, and to weigh in on the COVID situation facing this season.

episodes.title: 8-12-20 - Darnell Dixon - Assuming BYU plays a football season, what could it look like?
episodes.description: Ben and Brandon are joined by Darnell Dixon, of the Daily Herald, to talk BYU football. Darnell talks about the possibility of BYU playing a football season and, if they do, what would it look like both in schedule and protocols.

episodes.title: 8-12-20 - Hour 3 How important is it for BYU to play this year?
episodes.description: On the third hour of the show, Ben and Brandon continue to talk COVID, but they also talk about what it means to have a president that is pushing to play. Trajan Pili also joins the show to talk BYU football

episodes.title: 8-12-20 - Hour 2 - How will COVID effect player eligibility for this season and next?
episodes.description: On the second hour of the show, Ben and Brandon continue the discussion of COVID-19 and its effects on the football season. In addition to the effect on schedule, COVID could have an impact on player eligibility for this season and next.

episodes.title: 8-12-20 - Hour 1 - What will BYUs football schedule look like?
episodes.description: Ben is joined by Brandon Gurney to talk BYU football. With news on conferences like the PAC-12 cancelling the season, Ben and Brandon discuss what BYUs football schedule could look like.

episodes.title: 8-11-20 - Dr Darren Campbell, BYU Head Physician - What protocols are in place at BYU?
episodes.description:

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Hour 3 - Who will start at QB this fall for BYU & are sports essential?
episodes.description: On the third hour of the show, Ben is joined by Cam Mellor to discuss the depth at QB for the BYU football team ahead of the 2020 season. Dixie State Head Coach Andrew May also joins the show to talk about eh question of whether sports are essential

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Andrew May - Are sports essential?
episodes.description: Dixie State Basketball Head Coach, Andrew May, joins the show. Andrew joins Ben to talk about the 2020 football season, the Dixie State Football team, as well as a piece he recently penned about the essential nature of sports to both athletes and society.

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Hour 2 - Will Yoelli Childs Succeed in the NBA?
episodes.description: In the second hour of the show, Yoeli Childs joins Ben to talk about how he has been staying in shape. Bryan Kalbrowski also joins to talk about Yoeli. Jay Drew also joins the show to weigh in on the 2020 football season

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Cam Mellor - Which BYU QB has the most potential?
episodes.description: Cam Mellor, formerly of PFF, joins the show to talk BYU football and more specifically the QB discussion and who he thinks the best prospect is.

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Jay Drew - Will fans be in attendance at LES this fall?
episodes.description: Jay Drew, of The Deseret News joins the show. Jay joins to talk BYU football and what a season could like in the midst of the COVID pandemic

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Bryan Kalbrowsky - What can Yoeli Childs bring to an NBA team?
episodes.description: Bryan Kalbrowski, of Hoops Hype Report, joins the show. Bryan joins Ben to talk about Yoeli Childs, what a NBA combine invite means, and what he could bring to the next level

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Yoeli Childs - How has he been preparing for the NBA combine?
episodes.description: Former BYU great Yoeli  Childs joins the show. Yoeli joins Ben to talk about how he has been staying busy through the pandemic as well as his invite to the NBA combine and what he is looking forward to.

episodes.title: 7-27-20 - Hour 1 - Will there be football this fall?
episodes.description: Ben discusses the burning topic of college football. He weighs in on whether he believes there will be college football taking place this fall. Ben is also joined by Tim Davis to talk football as well as basketball

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Devon Blackmon - Former BYU Football player
episodes.description: Former BYU Football player, Devon Blackmon joins the show. Devon joins to offer his thoughts on the state of the US regarding race relations and what African American student athletes should consider when choosing their schools. Devon also relays his experience testing positive for COVID-19

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Tre Ofahengaue - Level Up Athletes CEO
episodes.description: CEO of Level Up Athletes, Tre Ofahengaue, joins the show. Tre joins to talk recruiting, who has committed, who is showing real potential, as well as who BYU is hoping to offer.

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Jay Drew - Deseret News
episodes.description: Jay Drew, of the Deseret News joins the program. Jay joins to talk about he piece he recently penned regarding COVID-19 at BYU. Jay weighs in on whether players will be able to play this year, the liabilities around it, and what precautions are being taken to keep players and staff safe.

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Ryan Teeples - Teeples Consulting
episodes.description: Ryan Teeples of Teeples Consulting, joins the show. Ryan joins to discuss with Ben and Moose the recent listing of the Director of the Cougar Club. They break down what is entailed and who might be a good fit.

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Even Brennan - Agent for United Athletes Sports
episodes.description: Evan Brennan, agent for United Athletes Sports, joins Ben and Moose. Evan joins the show to break down COVID-19 and what exactly it could look like if football is played this year. Evan talks about the liability surrounding playing, as well as players potentially making money off their name and likeness

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Hour 3 - Which BYU recruit shows the most promise?
episodes.description: On the third hour of Cougar Sports, Ben and Moose are joined by Tre Ofahengaue to talk recruiting. Devon Blackmon, former BYU player, joins the show to talk about race relation in our country as well as to share his experiences with COVID-19

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Hour 2 - Have any BYU Football players tested positive for COVID?
episodes.description: On the second hour of the show, Moose and Ben discuss the impact that COVID-19 will have on football. Jay Drew of the Deseret News joins the show to talk about what protocols are in place to enable play. Evan Brennan of United Athletes Sports also joins to talk about the liability of returning to play in the fall.

episodes.title: 7-7-20 - Hour 1 - Who will head the Cougar Club?
episodes.description: Ben and co-host Moose Bingham talk about the new job listing of Director of the Cougar Club. They talk about what is entailed as well as who they think would be the best fit. Ryan Teeples of Teeples consulting also joins the show to offer his opinion.

episodes.title: 6-3-20 - Hour 3 - Can BYU finally beat Utah this year?
episodes.description: On the third hour of Cougar Sports, Hunter and Moose are joined by NY Jets LB Harvey Langi to talk BYU football, COVID-19, as well as the difference between college and pros. Casey Lundquist, of Sports Illustrated, also joins the show to talk recruiting and weigh in on the BYU QB discussion

episodes.title: Casey Lundquist - Sports Illustrated BYU - 6-3-20
episodes.description: Casey Lundquist, of Sports Illustrated, joins the show. Casey joins to talk some BYU recruiting, transfer portal, the QB discussion as if he thinks Jaxon Dart will work at BYU

episodes.title: Harvey Langi - NY Jets LB - 6-3-20
episodes.description: New York Jets LB, and former BYU LB Harvey Langi joins the show. Harvey joins to talk about how he has been staying in shape during this off season. Harvey also talks about what it is like playing with other former Cougars in the NFL and  some of the biggest differences between college and the pros.

episodes.title: 6-3-20 - Hour 2 - Will Brandon Averette work at BYU?
episodes.description: On the second hour of the show, Hunter and Moose catch up with Jeff Call of the Deseret News. Jeff talks about the pieces he recently wrote about athletes returning to campus. Jay Yoemans also joins the show to talk BYU hoops and his thoughts on Brandon Averette entering the transfer portal

episodes.title: Jay Yoemans - J Money Sports - 6-3-20
episodes.description: Jay Yoemans, of J Money Sports, joins the show. Jay joins to talk some BYU hoops and weigh in on topics ranging from the transfer portal, BYU as a nationally respected program, and what his expectations are for this upcoming year.

episodes.title: Jeff Call- Deseret News - 6-3-20
episodes.description: Jeff Call, of the Deseret News, joins the show. Jeff joins to talk BYU football, off season training throughout the pandemic, and whether or not he thinks there will be fans in attendance come football season this fall.

episodes.title: 6-3-20 - Hour 1 - Will there be fans at the BYU games this fall?
episodes.description: Hunter Miller is still filling in for Ben as he celebrates his wedding. Hunter is joined by Moose Bingham to talk BYU football. Hunter and Moose talk about off season training, whether or not they think fans will be in attendance this fall, and they talk about the best BYU players to don the number 92

episodes.title: 6-2-20 - Hour 2 - How has BYU football been handling the pandemic?
episodes.description: On the second hour of the show, Hunter Miller continues the conversation about BYU football and listens to some more Kalani Sitake sound regarding the pandemic. Dick Harmon, of the Deseret News, also joins the show to talk some BYU football

episodes.title: Dick Harmon - Deseret News - 6-2-20
episodes.description: Dick Harmon, of the Deseret News, joins the show. Dick talks to Hunter about BYU football as well as the legendary victory over the Miami Hurricanes.

episodes.title: Mitch Harper - 6-2-20 - KSL Sports
episodes.description: Mitch Harper, of KSL Sports, joins the show to talk BYU sports and what he has been up to during this unusual time.

episodes.title: 6-2-2- - Rich Nelson - BYU Store
episodes.description: Rich Nelson, from the BYU Campus Store joins the show. Rich joins to talk about whats new at the Campus Store as well as the Campus Appreciation Sale that is going on right now.

episodes.title: 6-2-20 - Hour 1 - Where would you rank Zack Wilson nationally?
episodes.description: On today's show, Hunter Miller fills in for Ben who is still celebrating his wedding. Hunter talks about the national QB conversation. Rich Nelson of the BYU store also joins the show to talk about the campus appreciation sale. Mitch Harper, of KSL Sports, also joins the show to catch up with Hunter and talk about BYU sports.

episodes.title: 6-1-20 - Hour 3 - Was Jimmer the best Cougar ever?
episodes.description: On the third hour of Cougar Sports, Jonathan Tavernari joins the show to talk Jimmer Fredette as well as the state of BYU hoops. Michelle Monk of the BYU Bookstore also joins the show to talk about the Campus Appreciation Sale.

episodes.title: 6-1-20 - Michelle Monk - Cougar Tech Manager
episodes.description: Micehlle Monk, the Cougar Tech Manager at BYU, joins the show. Michelle talks about what is new and what is going on at the BYU Store. Michelle also talks about the Campus Appreciation Sale that is currently taking place.

episodes.title: 6-1-20 - Jonathan Tavernari - Former BYU Player
episodes.description: Jonathan Tavernari, former BYU hoops player jions the show. Jonathan weighs in on the debate about Jimmer Fredette. Jonathan talks about Jimmer Mania and just how massive it was nationally. Jonathan also talks BYU basketball and how the team is performing now and how they could improve in the future.

episodes.title: 6-1-20 - Hour 2 - Which team will return in the best shape?
episodes.description: Darnell Dixon and Hunter Miller continue to talk BYU sports. Brandon Gurney joins the show to talk about baseball and football during the off season. BYU Baseball head coach, Mike Littlewood, also joins the show to talk about how the BYU baseball team has been adapting to these strange times.

episodes.title: 6-1-20 - Mike Littlewood - BYU Baseball Coach
episodes.description: BYU Baseball head coach, Mike Littlewood, joins the show. Mike joins to talk about the baseball team, the unusual circumstances around this season and what the team is doing to stay in shape.

episodes.title: 6-1-20 - Brandon Gurney - Deseret News
episodes.description: Brandon Gurney joins the show. Brandon talks about the return of live sports with some high school baseball. Brandon also weighs in on the state of BYU hoops as well as which team he thinks will return in the best shape.

episodes.title: 6-1-20 - Hour 1 - Is BYU Hoops a nationally respected program?
episodes.description: Darnell Dixon and Hunter Miller fill in for Ben who got married over the weekend. Hunter and Darnell talk BYU Hoops and BYU Football. They talk about BYU Hoops in the national conversation as well as discuss how the pandemic has effected the players ability to stay in shape.

episodes.title: 5-29-20 - Trevin Knell - BYU Hoops
episodes.description:

episodes.title: 5-22-20 - Tony Jones - The Athletic
episodes.description: Tony Jones, of the Athletic, joins the show. Tony joins to break down and offer his opinion on the Mac McClung news. Tony talks about Macs game and how it could fit in at BYU and how BYU could help his game.

episodes.title: 5-22-20 - Steve Cleveland - Former BYU Hoops Coach
episodes.description: Former BYU coach Steve Cleveland joins the show. Steve talks about BYU hoops, what it is like dealing with the transfer portal, as well as what makes BYU a special program.

episodes.title: Cougar Sports - 5-22-20 - Hour 3 - Mac McClung to BYU?
episodes.description: In the third hour of the show, Ben and Darnell are joined by former BYU hoops coach Steve Cleveland as well as Tony Jones from the Athletic. Steve Cleveland talks about BYU hoops and the transfer portal. Tony Jones breaks down the news about Mac McClung considering BYU.

episodes.title: 5-22-20 - Jon Quist - LES Field Maintenance
episodes.description: Jon Quist, Field Manager at LES, joins the show. Jon talks to Ben about what it is like being Field Manager at LES. Jon also talks about his back round, as well as what goes into the grass at LES.

episodes.title: 5-22-20 - Cody Fueger - BYU Hoops Assistant
episodes.description: BYU Hoops assistant coach, Cody Fueger, joins the show. Cody talks about what it has been like for him during these unusual times. He also talks about upcoming season, transfer portal, and who was the most athletic player he ever coached.

episodes.title: Cougar Sports - 5-22-20 - Hour 2 - What makes the grass at LES special?
episodes.description: In the second hour of the show, Ben is joined by BYU assistant coach Cody Fueger. Cody talks adapting, recruiting and upcoming seasons. Ben is also joined by Jon Quist. Jon Quist is the field manager at LES and he talks about what his job is like and what makes the LES grass special.

episodes.title: Jaxson Dart - 5-22-20 - New CC High School QB
episodes.description: New Corner Canyon high school QB Jaxson Wilson joins the show. Jaxson talks about his football backround, his new offense at CC high, as well as his offer from BYU and what he likes about the school.

episodes.title: Cougar Sports - 5-22-20 - Hour 1 - Should we believe the Zack Wilson hype?
episodes.description: On this weeks show Ben is joined by Darnell Dixon to talk BYU football and basketball. Ben and Darnell talk to new Corner Canyon high school QB about his BYU offer. They also talk about Zack Wilson and discuss the recent hype he has been getting from John Beck and others.
